_comment: Categories: Courses, Specialized Programs, Diplom, Bachelor, Technologist, Technical

education.title: Developing Interpersonal Skills
education.desc: About identify and analyze different communication styles, conflict response styles, build and maintain trust and increase self-confidence.

education.title: Foundations of Project Management
education.desc: About project management skills, roles and responsibilities. Learned how to explain life cycle of a project, define organizational structure and organizational culture.

education.title: GitHub Actions
education.desc: About workflow automation, CI/CD, and GitHub Actions. Learned how to use GitHub Actions to automate tasks and workflows like building, testing, and deploying applications.

education.title: Introduction to HTML5
education.desc: About semantic HTML, HTML5 tags, and HTML5 attributes. Learned how to use HTML5 tags and attributes to create semantically correct and accessible web pages.

education.title: Introduction to CSS3
education.desc: About CSS3 properties, selectors, and values. Learned how to use CSS3 properties and selectors to style web pages and create responsive designs.

education.title: Programming with JavaScript
education.desc: About JavaScript syntax, data types, and control structures. Learned how to use JavaScript to manipulate HTML elements, handle events, and create interactive web pages.

education.title: Introduction to Front-End Development
education.desc: About HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Learned how to use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create web pages and web applications.

education.title: Specialization in Design UX/UI
education.desc: About user interface design, user experience design, and wireframing. Learned how to create user interfaces for web applications and mobile applications.
